name: v1.0.2
body:

- [#8894](https://github.com/Sylius/Sylius/pull/8894) [AUTO] Updated translations from Crowdin (@SyliusBot)

- [#8872](https://github.com/Sylius/Sylius/pull/8872) [AUTO] Updated translations from Crowdin (@SyliusBot)

- [#8868](https://github.com/Sylius/Sylius/pull/8868) [Travis] Allow failures for PHP 7.2 builds (@pamil)

- [#8842](https://github.com/Sylius/Sylius/pull/8842) Added missing return type in customization/controller docs (@kejwmen)

name: Stable Release Candidate 2
body:
ðŸŽ‰ 

* Fix desync of customer's e-mail & username
* Fixed disabling account verification (e-mail was sent anyway)
* Fix bug with currency context returning null values after Doctrine exception
* Upgrade SensioDistributionBundle
* Sync translations
* Fixed overall CS

name: Stable Release Candidate 1
body:
ðŸŽ‰ 

* Removed support for PHP version older than 7.1
* Introduce scalar typehints everywhere
* Reorganized documentation
* Use migrations when running sylius:install
* Fix admin's password change
* Added "staging" environment
* Deleting files together with images in admin
* Displaying orders in my account only from current channel
* Upgraded to Twig 2.0
* Upgraded to JMS Serializer Bundle 2.0
* Disable access to login page for already logged in
* Remove "_locale" from URLs when single locale is used
* [SECURITY] Prevent guest order hijacking (https://github.com/Sylius/Sylius/pull/8586)
* Support "authorize -> capture" workflow for payments (https://github.com/Sylius/Sylius/pull/8553)
* Remove payments/shipments from order when not needed
* Preview uploaded images in admin
* Removed Symfony 3.2 support (3.3 only)
* [API] Display coupons only for queried promotion
* Upgrade jQuery to 3.0
* Upgrade Yarn to 1.0
* Various bug fixes and small improvements

name: v1.0.0-beta.3
body: Third BETA release of Sylius eCommerce Framework

name: v1.0.0-beta.2
body: Second BETA release of Sylius eCommerce Framework.

name: v1.0.0-alpha.1
body:
First Sylius 1.0.0 Alpha release!
- Completely new admin and shop interfaces
- NPM, Gulp and SemanticUI for the UI development
- Simplified architecture with Core, Shop, Admin and API bundles
- Business logic based on StateMachine
- Over 800 new Behat scenarios with 8,000 steps
- Much more!

name: v0.15.0
